name: Hotel Sophia
description:
Welcome to Hotel Sophia centrally located in the Melbourne CBD and walking distance to Southern Cross Station, Etihad Stadium, Crown Casino, Melbourne restaurants and entertainment and the Queen Victor Walking distance to Southern Cross Station, Etihad Stadium, Crown Casino, Melbourne restaurants and entertainment and the Queen Via Markets. 

We pride ourselves on our Melbourne accommodation personalised service and our spotlessly clean Melbourne budget accommodation four star rooms. Hotel Sophia offers a range of standard doubles, triples and Superior rooms for the Melbourne boutique hotel traveller. Hotel Sophia is one of the few Melbourne budget boutique hotels that offers quality new accommodation with a generous complimentary buffet breakfast to start the day. When checking in be sure to ask our friendly staff for local tips on what to and where to go in the Melbourne CBD and further afield……and always be sure to grab a complimentary info map from reception and ask how to catch the free City Cirle tram on

houseRules.notes:
Please note that guests are required to present a valid credit card upon check in. All of our bookings are pre-paid.
Please note that there is a non-refundable 2% charge when you pay with a Visa, American Express or Mastercard credit card. 
Please note that an AUD $150 security deposit is required upon check in. No cash deposit will be excepted.
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to room type. Please enter the dates of your stay and check what conditions apply to your preferred room.
Children under 4 years of old can stay with free cost but no extra bed will be provided.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
Pets are not allowed.
